item.title: Cultural evolution of emotional expression in 50 years of song lyrics
item.description:
Together with Lotty Brand, we wrote a piece for aeon about the paper: Why are pop songs getting sadder than they used to be?

The piece was then widely covered by popular and scientific media, including for example The Times (UK), [De Standaard] (https://www.standaard.be/cnt/dmf20200226_04866569) (Belgium), or [Dagbaldet Information] (https://www.information.dk/kultur/2020/02/popsange-soergeligere-soergeligere-viser-ny-undersoegelse) (Danemark)
